title: Senior Python Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Python Developer with expertise in Django, Flask, and SQL. Experience with AWS and Docker is a major plus. Strong problem-solving and communication skills are required.

title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Join our team as a Frontend Engineer specializing in React and JavaScript. You will build modern UI/UX components. Must know React, Node.js, and CSS. Figma experience is a bonus.

title: Data Scientist
description: AnalyzeMe is hiring a Data Scientist. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in machine learning, Python, and data analysis. Experience with scikit-learn, pandas, and TensorFlow or PyTorch is essential.

title: Junior Java Developer
description: Entry-level Java Developer position. We will train you! A degree in Computer Science and basic knowledge of Java and SQL is required. Great teamwork and a desire to learn are key.

title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
description: We need a DevOps Engineer with 3+ years of experience in AWS or Azure. Must be proficient in Kubernetes, Docker, and Terraform. Scripting skills in Python or Bash are necessary.

title: Product Manager
description: Seeking a Product Manager to lead our mobile app team. Must have experience with agile methodologies, scrum, and jira. Strong communication and leadership skills are paramount.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are hiring a creative UI/UX Designer. You will be responsible for designing user-friendly interfaces. Must be an expert in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.
